summary: User asks how to test child workflows in the PHP SDK, referencing the sample ParentWorkflow implementation. The question was redirected to Slack for community support.
userImpact: Users need guidance on testing patterns for child workflows in PHP applications.
resolutionDetails: Issue redirected to Slack community support channel rather than being addressed as a product issue.
keyQuote: Feel free to raise your question in the Slack, our team would be happy to help you
